languages.text: Вернувшись к шаттлу, {name} получил{mf||а} сводку о состоянии "Рожденного в огне". Неустанно пронзающие его взглядом авгуров техножрецы настаивали на скорейшем сворачивании операции, опасаясь больших разрушений. Также пришли сообщения о положении двух других отрядов.

traits.locale_text: Вернувшись к шаттлу, {name} получил{mf||а} сводку о положении двух других скаут-отрядов.

languages.text: After returning to the shuttle, {name} received reports about Fireborn's status. The Tech-Priests who relentlessly pierced the wreckage with the augur's gaze insisted on curtailing the operation as soon as possible, fearing imminent destruction. There were also reports from the other two units.
languages.original_text: Вернувшись к шаттлу, {name} получил{mf||а} сводку о состоянии "Рожденного в огне". Неустанно пронзающие его взглядом авгуров техножрецы настаивали на скорейшем сворачивании операции, опасаясь больших разрушений. Также пришли сообщения о положении двух других отрядов.

traits.locale_text: After returning to the shuttle, {name} received status reports from the other two units.
After returning to the shuttle, {name} received status reports from the other two units.
After returning to the shuttle, {name} received status reports from the other two units.

After returning to the shuttle, {name} received reports about Fireborn's status. The Tech-Priests who relentlessly pierced the wreckage with the augur's gaze insisted on curtailing the operation as soon as possible, fearing imminent destruction. There were also reports from the other two units.

languages.text: Tras volver a la lanzadera, {name} recibió informes sobre el estado de la Nacida del Fuego. Los tecnosacerdotes que perforaban los restos con la mirada incesante de los augures insistían en finalizar la operación cuanto antes, temiendo la destrucción inminente de la nave. Las otras dos unidades también habían enviado informes.
languages.original_text: After returning to the shuttle, {name} received reports about Fireborn's status. The Tech-Priests who relentlessly pierced the wreckage with the augur's gaze insisted on curtailing the operation as soon as possible, fearing imminent destruction. There were also reports from the other two units.

traits.locale_text: Tras volver a la lanzadera, {name} recibió informes sobre el estado de la Nacida del Fuego. Los tecnosacerdotes que perforaban los restos con la mirada incesante de los augures insistían en finalizar la operación cuanto antes, temiendo la destrucción inminente de la nave. Las otras dos unidades también habían enviado informes.

languages.text: {name}返回穿梭机之后，收到了关于“烈焰之子”号目前状态的报告。技术神甫们使用俄歇矩阵完整地扫描了飞船残骸，坚持要加快搜索进度，因为他们担心这艘飞船可能随时会崩塌。此外，舰长大人还收到了来自另外两支探索队的报告。
languages.original_text: After returning to the shuttle, {name} received reports about Fireborn's status. The Tech-Priests who relentlessly pierced the wreckage with the augur's gaze insisted on curtailing the operation as soon as possible, fearing imminent destruction. There were also reports from the other two units.

traits.locale_text: {name}返回穿梭机之后，收到了关于“烈焰之子”号目前状态的报告。技术祭司们使用俄歇矩阵完整地扫描了飞船残骸，坚持要加快搜索进度，因为他们担心这艘飞船可能随时会崩塌。此外，舰长大人还收到了来自另外两支探索队的报告。

languages.text: シャトルに戻った後、{name}はファイアボーンの状況について報告を受ける。予言者の視線で容赦なく残骸を突きつけた技術司祭たちは、今にも起きそうな崩壊を恐れてできるだけ早く作戦を中止するよう主張した。他の2つの部隊からも報告が入る。
languages.original_text: After returning to the shuttle, {name} received reports about Fireborn's status. The Tech-Priests who relentlessly pierced the wreckage with the augur's gaze insisted on curtailing the operation as soon as possible, fearing imminent destruction. There were also reports from the other two units.

traits.locale_text: シャトルに戻った後、{name}はファイアボーンの状況について報告を受ける。予言者の視線で容赦なく残骸を突きつけた技術司祭たちは、今にも起きそうな崩壊を恐れてできるだけ早く作戦を中止するよう主張した。他の2つの部隊からも報告が入る。

languages.text: Nach der Rückkehr zum Shuttle erhielt {name} Berichte über den Status der Fireborn. Der Techpriester, der das Wrack unermüdlich mit dem Blick des Auguren absuchte, befürchtete die unmittelbar bevorstehende Zerstörung und bestand darauf, die Operation möglichst bald zu beenden. Von den anderen beiden Einheiten lagen ebenfalls Berichte vor.
languages.original_text: After returning to the shuttle, {name} received reports about Fireborn's status. The Tech-Priests who relentlessly pierced the wreckage with the augur's gaze insisted on curtailing the operation as soon as possible, fearing imminent destruction. There were also reports from the other two units.

traits.locale_text: Nach der Rückkehr zum Shuttle erhielt {name} Berichte über den Status der Fireborn. Der Techpriester, der das Wrack unermüdlich mit dem Blick des Auguren absuchte, befürchtete die unmittelbar bevorstehende Zerstörung und bestand darauf, die Operation möglichst bald zu beenden. Von den anderen beiden Einheiten lagen ebenfalls Berichte vor.

languages.text: Une fois de retour à la navette, {name} reçut des rapports concernant l'état du Flamboyant. Les technoprêtres qui observaient sans relâche l'épave à travers les augures insistaient pour mettre fin à l'opération au plus vite, craignant la destruction imminente du vaisseau. Les deux autres unités lui firent également un compte rendu de leur expédition.
languages.original_text: After returning to the shuttle, {name} received reports about Fireborn's status. The Tech-Priests who relentlessly pierced the wreckage with the augur's gaze insisted on curtailing the operation as soon as possible, fearing imminent destruction. There were also reports from the other two units.

traits.locale_text: Une fois de retour à la navette, {name} reçut des rapports concernant l'état du Flamboyant. Les technoprêtres qui observaient sans relâche l'épave à travers les augures insistaient pour mettre fin à l'opération au plus vite, craignant la destruction imminente du vaisseau. Les deux autres unités lui firent également un compte rendu de leur expédition.

languages.text: Mekiğe dönen {name}, Ateşten'in durumuyla ilgili raporlar almaya başladı. Alamet bakışıyla enkazdan gözlerini ayırmayan Tekno Rahipler, operasyonun en kısa sürede sonlandırılması konusunda ısrarcıydı. Zira geminin yok oluşunun eli kulağındaydı. Diğer iki birime dair raporlar da mevcuttu.
languages.original_text: After returning to the shuttle, {name} received reports about Fireborn's status. The Tech-Priests who relentlessly pierced the wreckage with the augur's gaze insisted on curtailing the operation as soon as possible, fearing imminent destruction. There were also reports from the other two units.

traits.locale_text: Mekiğe dönen {name}, Ateşten'in durumu hakkında raporlar almaya başladı. Alamet bakışıyla enkazdan gözlerini ayırmayan Tekno Rahipler, operasyonun en kısa sürede sonlandırılması konusunda ısrarcıydı. Zira geminin yok oluşunun eli kulağındaydı. Diğer iki birim hakkında da raporlar mevcuttu.
